sub_topic: Show that every group of order 32 is isomorphic to either the cyclic group C32, the dihedral group D16, or one of the six non-abelian groups of order 32.
message_1: How many non-isomorphic groups of order 32 are there, and what are they?
message_2:
There are 51 non-isomorphic groups of order 32. They can be classified as follows:

1. Cyclic group: C_32
2. Direct product of two cyclic groups: C_2 × C_16, C_4 × C_8, and C_8 × C_4
3. Direct product of three cyclic groups: C_2 × C_2 × C_8, C_2 × C_4 × C_4, and C_4 × C_2 × C_4
4. Direct product of four cyclic groups: C_2 × C_2 × C_2 × C_4 and C_2 × C_2 × C_4 × C_2
5. Direct product of five cyclic groups: C_2 × C_2 × C_2 × C_2 × C_2

6-10. Five groups of the form (C_4 × C_4) ⋊ C_2
11-15. Five groups of the form (C_8 × C_2) ⋊ C_2
16-20. Five groups of the form (C_16 × C_2) ⋊ C_2
21-25. Five groups of the form (C_2 × C_2 × C_4) ⋊ C_2
26-30. Five groups of the form (C_2 × C_2 × C_2 × C_2) ⋊ C_2

31-35. Five groups of the form (C_4 × C_4) ⋊ C_4
36-40. Five groups of the form (C_8 × C_2) ⋊ C_4
41-45. Five groups of the form (C_16 × C_2) ⋊ C_4

46-50. Five groups of the form (C_2 × C_2 × C_4) ⋊ C_4

51. The Quaternion group of order 32: Q_32

These 51 non-isomorphic groups of order 32 can be found using the classification of finite p-groups, where p is a prime number. In this case, p = 2, and the order of the group is 32 = 2^5.
